TRIM: PITCH TRIM Wheel - NOSE DN

AUX: CHANNEL - Cycle Down Left Digit

AUX: CHANNEL - Cycle Down Center Dig.

AUX: CHANNEL - Cycle Down Right Digit

UHF: PRESET CHANNEL Knob - Cycle Down

UHF: A-3-2-T Rotary X__.___ - Step Down

UHF: VOL Knob - AI vs IVC Volume Decr
